mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view the list of advertisements
List_advertises_view displays the list of advertisements
Admin clicks on the edit button of an advertisement
List_advertises_view redirects to the edit_advertise_view page
Edit_advertise_view shows the content of the advertisement
Admin edits the advertisement data and clicks the save button
Edit_advertise_view sends the information to AdsController
AdsController saves the data in AdsModel
AdsModel returns the saved data to AdsController
AdsController returns the save result to edit_advertise_view
